Learn American Sign Language Practically.

Phrases Dictionary

English-American Sign Language dictionary contains video for over 100,000 words.

Alphabet Songs

Learn alphabets through songs from Jack Hartmann Kids Music Channel

ASL Basic Curriculum

Learn Numbers

Learn numbers from 0-10 in chronological order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Random Numbers Quiz

Show your hands on screen and AI will try to predict the numbers from 0-10 based on your hand signs.

Learn Alphabets A-F

Learn alphabets from A-F in chronological order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Alphabets Quiz A-F

Learn alphabets from A-F in random order with the help of artificial intelligence quiz.

Learn Alphabets G-K

Learn alphabets from G-K in chronological order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Alphabets Quiz G-K

Learn alphabets from G-K in random order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Learn Alphabets L-P

Learn alphabets from L-P in chronological order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Alphabets Quiz L-P

Learn alphabets from L-P in random order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Learn Alphabets Q-U

Learn alphabets from Q-U in chronological order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Alphabets Quiz Q-U

Learn alphabets from Q-U in random order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Learn Alphabets V-Z

Learn alphabets from V-Z in chronological order with the help of artificial intelligence.

Alphabets Quiz V-Z

Learn alphabets from V-Z in random order with the help of artificial intelligence.
